1a1(mdo sde): (ya) @#/ ! /mdo sde sna tshogs kyi skor bzhugs so/ /
1a2(mdo sde): (黃) 經藏第二十四部
1b1(mdo sde): dpang skong phyag brgya pa zhes bya ba/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag
1b2(mdo sde): n a dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas
1b3(mdo sde): pa rab 'byam ma lus pa'i dkon mchog thams cad la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
1b4(mdo sde): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag
1b5(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nub
1b6(mdo sde): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang phyogs kyi sangs
1b7(mdo sde): rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang shar mtshams kyi sangs rgyas ting nge
1b8(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shar lho mtshams kyi sangs
2a1(mdo sde): rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lho nub mtshams kyi sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nub byang mtshams kyi sangs rgyas gdugs
2a2(mdo sde): dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma phyogs kyi sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag
2a3(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /yang shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
2a4(mdo sde): snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas don yod grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde dga' ba'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs
2a5(mdo sde): pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas tshe mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai dUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de
2a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sA la'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
2a7(mdo sde): rin po che'i dpal gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun du bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ud
2a8(mdo sde): pa la rgyas pa bsung gi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan gyi 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas rdo rje snying pos 'dul ba de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo bsgrags
2b1(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas rab tu gdon mi za ba pad mo rgyas pa'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdul med pa'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas seng ge de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rab tu snang ba'i 'jig rten na
2b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rin po che'i gtsug phud de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'od bzang po'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'da' bar dka' ba'i 'jig rten na sangs rgyas chos kyi
2b3(mdo sde): 'od zer rab tu rgyas pa'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rab tu bzang po'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i blo gros 'od zer gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /me long gi dkyil 'khor
2b4(mdo sde): bsgrags pa'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas zla ba'i thugs de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas zla 'od de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mdzes chen de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
2b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi dkyil 'khor dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dga' ba'i spyan de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
2b6(mdo sde): gser gyi gzu ba de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i yon tan gyi 'od zer de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas smon lam thams cad las 'byung ba'i rin po che'i gzi brjid shin du
2b7(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rdo rje'i rgya mtsho'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs
2b8(mdo sde): rgyas rnam par gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gtsug tor can de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas log par dad sel de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
3a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gser thub de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /da ltar bzhugs pa'i
3a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi sku mu med pa la phyag
3a3(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i sku gzugs thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ring bsrel thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod rten thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dam pa'i chos mdo'i sde la phyag
3a4(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lung du bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshigs su bcad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ched du brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gleng gzhi'i sde la phyag 'tshal
3a5(mdo sde): lo/ /rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyes pa rabs kyi sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shin du rgyas pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rmad du byung ba'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
3a6(mdo sde): chos rtogs pa bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod theg pa chen po'i mdzod thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi gsung rab thams cad dang / 'dul ba thabs kyi sgo mo ma
3a7(mdo sde): lus pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi dbyings yang dag pa'i mtha' brjod du med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs te/ dam pa'i chos kyi yi
3a8(mdo sde): ge thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shar phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lho phyogs kyi
3b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan med pas byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nub phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rgyal bas byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang shar
3b2(mdo sde): mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shar lho mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' lag na pad mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lho nub mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma rab
3b3(mdo sde): tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nub byang mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'og gi phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' pad mo dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma phyogs kyi byang chub sems
3b4(mdo sde): dpa' dga' bas byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po
3b5(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib
3b6(mdo sde): pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob pa la phyag 'tshal
3b7(mdo sde): lo/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab chen po'i mchog 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i mchog 'phags pa mo'ud gal
3b8(mdo sde): gyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mang du thos pa'i mchog 'phags pa kun dga' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi mchog 'phags pa 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bslab pa la gus pa'i mchog 'phags pa nor sbyin
4a1(mdo sde): 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dul ba 'dzin pa'i mchog 'phags pa nye bar 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan mnga' ba'i mchog 'phags pa ma 'gags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dri zhing lan ldon pa'i mchog
4a2(mdo sde): 'phags pa rab 'byor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa dgra bcom pa'i dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun bzhugs pa thams cad la
4a3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la dad pas phyag 'tshal nas/ /sdig pa kun byang dge tshogs rnam par 'phel/ /bcom ldan so so'i bka' las ci 'byung ba/ /yon tan khyad par can de grub par shog /phyogs bcu'i dkon
4a4(mdo sde): mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bstod cing bsngags so/ /blta zhing brtag go/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams rab 'byam las byung ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs mchog /gtso bo/ dam pa/ khyad par
4a5(mdo sde): can/ bzang po/ gya nom pa/ bla na med pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas phyogs bcu'i snod kyi 'jig rten byur bur bkang ste/ chos kyi mchod pa dang bcas pas ma lus myi lus lus pa med pa'i dkon mchog gsum la phyi ma'i mu'i
4a6(mdo sde): mthar rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod cing 'don to/ /dbul zhing gsol lo/ /bkur stir bgyi'o/ /bla mar bgyi'o/ /ri mor bgyi'o/ /mnyes par bgyi'o/ /bdag cag gi skye ba 'di dang thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa nas srid pa gsum
4a7(mdo sde): gyi 'khor ba na 'khor zhing 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gsum gyi dbang gis lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sgo nas mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga la sogs te/ gsung rab kun las 'gal ba'i sdig pa
4a8(mdo sde): mi dge ba'i las bdag gis ci bgyis pa dang / gzhan la bcol ba dang / gzhan bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba de dag rdul tsam bag tsam yang ma lus par mthol zhing bshags so/ /sbyangs zhing bslad do/ /gzhig cing gdon to/ /mi
4b1(mdo sde): 'chab bo/ /mi sbed do/ /mi bsnyen mi bgyid do/ /de nas de'i tshe sdig pa thams cad ni byang / bsod nams thams cad ni rdzogs te/ dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du/ dgongs pa'i dbang gis ched tu sprul pa ma gtogs par nam
4b2(mdo sde): nam zhar zhar tshe tshe rabs rabs su ngan song gsum la sogs te/ bgegs rigs thams cad du mi skye mi ltung bar shog shig /log pa mi dge ba la mi phyogs par shog shig /las dang nyon mongs pa'i rgyu la mi phyogs mi bgyid par shog shig /
4b3(mdo sde): smad pa'i lus dang sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu kun las thar nas mi myong bar shog shig /dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du sgo gsum nas dge ba chu bo'i rgyun bzhin du rgyun myi 'chad par shog shig /tshe rabs gar skyes kyang
4b4(mdo sde): bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan te/ sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba la mthu dang dbang yod par shog shig /gang de bzhin gshegs pa 'ba' zhig gi thugs su chud pa'i chos bla na med pa'i byang chub tu gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya ba'i don
4b5(mdo sde): de kho na nyid gang yin pa de bdag gis kyang ma nor bar khong du chud cing sgom la/ gzhan dag la yang ma nor bar ston cing 'dren par shog shig /dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi ste/ bdag
4b6(mdo sde): nyid lus dbul gyis thugs rje chen po ldan pa rnams kyis so so nas rtag tu bzhes shig / ji ltar na dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' yod pa thams cad dang bral ba/ dngos po dang / sems dang / skye mched kyis ma zin
4b7(mdo sde): pa'i chos bdag med pa dang mnyam pa/ thog ma nas ma skyes pa/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ltar bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang / dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du byang chub tu sems
4b8(mdo sde): bskyed par bgyi'o/ /byang chub kyi sems ni nam gzhar yang mi stor zhing bshes gnyen dam pa de dang nam yang mi 'bral bar shog shig /ji ltar dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas de dag bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba ltar/ bdag ming 'di
5a1(mdo sde): zhes bgyi bas kyang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo / /nam 'chi bar nges pa'i dus de na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i zhal mngon sum du mthong nas/ phyag
5a2(mdo sde): g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ bdag gi spyi bor bzhag nas lung nod par gyur cig /bdag gis kyang nyon mongs pas sems mi 'khrul par chos bdag med pa dang 'thun pa'i 'dun pa can dang / byang chub kyi sems tshad med pa
5a3(mdo sde): dang ldan bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed par shog shig / mdor na bag chags ma lus kun byang nas/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis yongs rdzogs te/ /'gro ba ma lus byin gyis bsgral ba'i phyir/ /bdag nyid myur du mngon par sangs
5a4(mdo sde): rgyas shog / dpang skong phyag brgya pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a tsin t+ya rA dzA sU tra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i rgyal po'i mdo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
5a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA na chos kyi dbye dgon pa na/ byang chub kyi snying po na seng ge'i khri rdo rje dang nor bu rin po
5a6(mdo sde): ches spras pa'i pad ma'i snying po'i gdan la bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi byang chub sems
5a7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la smras pa/
5a8(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
5b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
5b2(mdo sde): s angs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'jom pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
5b3(mdo sde): zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'joms pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa
5b4(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer shin tu stug po pad ma rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
5b5(mdo sde): p a'i sangs rgyas 'od zer shin tu stug po pad ma rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi sangs
5b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs
5b7(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i sangs rgyas
5b8(mdo sde): kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa
6a1(mdo sde): d gra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'od zer
6a2(mdo sde): me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'od zer me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas
6a3(mdo sde): kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes 'od zer rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs
6a4(mdo sde): p a dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes 'od zer rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i blo gros
6a5(mdo sde): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ltar bskal pa bgrang ba'i thabs 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis rtsis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi sangs rgyas
6a6(mdo sde): kyi zhing 'das pa'i tha ma 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma'i dpal zhes bya ba na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba bzang po'i dpal bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
6a7(mdo sde): zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i spyod
6a8(mdo sde): pa can/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis thos par 'gyur gyi/ gzhan dag gis ni thos par mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
6b1(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang /
6b2(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal pos gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /
6b3(mdo sde): 'phags pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i rgyal po'i mdo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya da sha di ga an d+ha kA ra bi d+h+wan sa na
6b4(mdo sde): nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di
6b5(mdo sde): skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi nang na/ ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / 'jam dpal
6b6(mdo sde): la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ sham thabs gsol nas/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos mnabs te/ dge slong
6b7(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /de'i tshe na shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal zhes bya ba zhig
6b8(mdo sde): bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shing rta la zhon nas ser skya'i gnas grong khyer chen po nas phyir byung ba dang / shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das thag ring po kho na nas gshegs pa mthong ngo / /mthong
7a1(mdo sde): nas kyang shing rta de las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
7a2(mdo sde): 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
7a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'di na bdag gi pha ma gnyis gnyid log pa dang ma log pa dag la mi ma lags pa rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid la/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang gang gi tshe ljongs kyi phyogs gzhan du mchi ba'i tshe/ bdag la
7a4(mdo sde): yang chom rkun pa dag rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid cing / gcan zan dag kyang rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag
7a5(mdo sde): la thugs brtse ba'i slad du ci nas kyang bdag la mi 'am/ mi ma lags pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa 'ga' yang rnam par 'tshe bar mi bgyid pa de ltar bdag la legs par bsrung ba mdzad du gsol/
7a6(mdo sde): bsrung ba'i cho ga yang bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhon nu de'i phyir legs par rab tu
7a7(mdo sde): nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/ shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad
7a8(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhon nu shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams nyon mongs pa thams cad bskyod pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin
7b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes spyod ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shar phyogs su 'gro na/ de'i tshe khyod kyis de
7b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing song na khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe ma g.yengs par de yid la byas na khyod bya ba gang
7b3(mdo sde): gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thub pa che/ /rje la rab tu phyag 'tshal te/ /rtag tu de ni mngon byed
7b4(mdo sde): cing / /'gro na khyod la 'jigs mi 'byung / /gzhon nu lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu khri 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mun pa dang mun nag gi tshogs bcom zhes bya ba
7b5(mdo sde): zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems dang po bskyed pa yid la mdzad pa rnam grangs bsnyengs pa dang bag tsha ba dang bral bas mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba
7b6(mdo sde): da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir lho phyogs su 'gro na/ de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/ sems kyi
7b7(mdo sde): rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing / khyim la sogs pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnam par ma g.yengs pa yid la byed pas song na/ khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing / khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas
7b8(mdo sde): kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /khyim gyi bsam pa rnams dang ni/ /kun nas ldang ba kun bral zhing / /lho phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/ /khyod la 'jigs pa
8a1(mdo sde): 'byung mi 'gyur/ /gzhon nu nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yul phebs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin
8a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khon dang rgyags pa rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir nub phyogs su 'gro na de'i
8a3(mdo sde): tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te/ dran par byas shing mdun du byas nas sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing zag pa med pa rnam par ma g.yengs pa dang dran pas khyod song na khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang
8a4(mdo sde): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /chos 'ga' skyes pa yod min zhing / /'ga' yang 'gag par mi 'gyur te/ /gang gis chos rnams de ltar shes/ /
8a5(mdo sde): de la 'jigs pa ci yang med/ /gzhon nu byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na
8a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gzugs bkod 'od gnon zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir byang phyogs
8a7(mdo sde): su 'gro na/ de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing rnam par ma g.yengs par yid la byed pas song na/ khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro
8a8(mdo sde): ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /rtag tu sems can thams cad la/ /mnyam pa nyid la
8b1(mdo sde): sems byos la/ /sems can de la ma brnyas dang / /khyod la 'jigs par 'byung mi 'gyur/ /gzhon nu byang shar gyi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams
8b2(mdo sde): bdud kyi sde bcom pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud dang yid gnyis kun 'joms rnam gnon zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /de
8b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
8b4(mdo sde): mi ldog par mdzad de/ gzhon nu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs pa'i skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu byung ba yin no/ /gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir byang shar gyi phyogs su 'gro na de'i tshe khyod
8b5(mdo sde): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing rnam par ma g.yengs pas song na khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing
8b6(mdo sde): khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /gang gis dang po'i thugs kyis ni/ /bdud rnams pham mdzad sangs rgyas de/ /
8b7(mdo sde): dran bzhin du ni khyod song na/ /khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur/ /gzhon nu shar lho'i phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu snang ba zhes bya ba
8b8(mdo sde): zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems dang po bskyed pas phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /
9a1(mdo sde): gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa des dang po thugs bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar du bar chad med par sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa kun du bsten/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan
9a2(mdo sde): bsgrubs/ shes rab spyad de/ gzhon nu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa de'i skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu byung ba yin no/ /gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shar lho'i phyogs su 'gro na/ de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
9a3(mdo sde): de la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te/ phyis khyim nas song shig dang / khyod la phyis 'gyod pa 'am 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par ma g.yengs pas yid la byed na/ khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de
9a4(mdo sde): 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /yan lag lngas ni phyag 'tshal te/ /phyi nas khyim nas song shig dang / /chom rkun rnams kyis khyod kun du/ /zil gyis mi non
9a5(mdo sde): 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gzhon nu lho nub kyi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
9a6(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gdugs 'phags snang zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir lho nub kyi phyogs su 'gro na de'i
9a7(mdo sde): tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing rnam par ma g.yengs pa'i yid la byed pas song na khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung
9a8(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur zhing khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas/ /me tog sil
9b1(mdo sde): mas gtor cig dang / /khyod ni lho nub 'gro ba na/ /'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gzhon nu nub byang gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig
9b2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams yongs dag rab gnas mngon par 'phags shes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
9b3(mdo sde): gzhes so/ /gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni mi gtsang ba med pa/ 'khrig pa med pa/ bud med med pa/ tsher ma dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med pa/ snyigs ma lnga med pa yin no/ /gzhon nu khyod gang gi tshe
9b4(mdo sde): bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir nub byang gi phyogs su 'gro na tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par blangs nas phyis khyim nas rnam par ma g.yengs pa'i yid la byed pas song shig dang / gzhon nu khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub
9b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur zhing khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /tshangs spyod yang dag blangs byas te/ /phyi nas khyim nas song shig
9b6(mdo sde): dang / /khyod ni gang dang gar 'gro yang / /chom rkun rnams kyis zil mi non/ /gzhon nu steng gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung drug bcu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams
9b7(mdo sde): dmigs pa med pa yid la byed pa can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skrag med mun bral ting nge 'dzin mngon 'phags rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar
9b8(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /gzhon nu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te 'dug kyang rung / 'greng yang rung / sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab
10a1(mdo sde): par byas nas rdzogs par byas shing gnas na khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /khyod kyis ma yengs yid byed
10a2(mdo sde): kyis/ /rtag tu rgyal ba de dran zhing / /rtag tu byams pa'i sems byos dang / /khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur/ /gzhon nu 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu khri nyis stong 'das pa na
10a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang po sems bskyed the tsom gcod mdzad nyon mongs bskyod ces
10a4(mdo sde): bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /gzhon nu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bya ba rtsom pa thams cad dang / 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / 'chag kyang rung ste/ spyod lam thams cad du phyag 'tshol
10a5(mdo sde): cig / yid la byos shig dang / sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems sgrubs shig dang / gzhon nu khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / dgos pa thams cad kyang 'bad
10a6(mdo sde): mi dgos par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /bya ba kun la nyin mtshan du/ /sangs rgyas de ni dran bya zhing / /byang chub sems kyang ma btang dang / /khyod la
10a7(mdo sde): 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur/ /gzhon nu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan legs par bzung bar gyis shig /legs par bcang bar gyis shig /
10a8(mdo sde): legs par kun chub par gyis shig dang / 'jigs pa dang / bag tsha ba 'am/ spu zing zhes byed pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad khyod la 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la shAkya gzhon nu
10b1(mdo sde): bzhin rab gsal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan rnams bzung lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
10b2(mdo sde): bdag la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag mun pa ma mchis shing / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang dper
10b3(mdo sde): na de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar 'khor rnams la chos ston pa bzhin du mthong ngo / /de nas 'khor de las shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal la sogs pa skye bo phal po che'i tshogs bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal
10b4(mdo sde): ba dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i srog chags stong tshang ba de dag thams cad stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo
10b5(mdo sde): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi don gyi slad du de bzhin gshegs
10b6(mdo sde): pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la phyogs de dag dang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang mun pa ma mchis par gda' la/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams de dag dang sangs rgyas
10b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang dper na/ da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa 'di bzhin du gda'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas/
10b8(mdo sde): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag
11a1(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan rnams thos nas mig rnam par dag cing phyogs bcu dag na 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag mchis pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas
11a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong ba de dag gi mig rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams de dag bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ tshe rabs gzhan du tshe 'phos na yang 'bral bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
11a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag 'di ltar mig rnam par dag pa de dag ni sgrib pa med pa'i tshul gyis shin du rnam par dag pa
11a4(mdo sde): nyid tu 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu khyod kyis srog chags stong tshang ba 'di mthong ngam/ shA ri'i bu 'di dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis re res kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid gang gA'i
11a5(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed dag byed du bcug nas srid pa tha ma dang / lus tha ma la byang chub kyi tshogs thams cad rdzogs par byas te/ bskal pa gcig la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
11a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas spyan dag pas brgyan pa zhes bya bar mtshan 'thun pa sha stag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de rnams
11a7(mdo sde): lung bstan pa bshad pa 'di bka' stsal ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun du rab tu 'gul/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun
11a8(mdo sde): du rab tu g.yos/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun du rab tu 'ur 'ur/ ldeg rab tu ldeg /kun du rab tu ldeg /chem chem rab tu chem chem/ kun du rab tu chem chem/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun du rab tu 'khrugs so/ /sa bla'i
11b1(mdo sde): l ha'i rnams kyis kyang kye ma grogs po dag 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan bzung ba tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su bzung zhing chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin
11b2(mdo sde): du mkhyen pas don thams cad thugs su chud pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar che ste/ su zhig sangs rgyas la dad par mi 'gyur zhes sgra bsgrags so/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa
11b3(mdo sde): gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bdud kyi ris rnams dang / tshangs ris rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang /
11b4(mdo sde): tshangs pa chen po rnams nas 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar gyis sa bla'i lha rnams kyis sgra de thos nas yi rangs shing rab tu dga' la dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas tshig 'di skad ces kye ma grogs po dag 'di ltar rigs kyi bu
11b5(mdo sde): ' di rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan bzung ba tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su bzung zhing chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pas don thams cad thugs su chud pa'i de
11b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar che ste/ su zhig sangs rgyas la dad par mi 'gyur zhes smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'i
11b7(mdo sde): theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed cing / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag
11b8(mdo sde): par ston par byed pa dang / tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin par rig par
12a1(mdo sde): bya'o/ /de dag la 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar rig par bya'o/ /de gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de dag pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de dag la chu dang / chom rkun dang / dug dang / mtshon
12a2(mdo sde): gyis 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar yid ches par bya'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsrung ba lung bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di shes nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung
12a3(mdo sde): ba'i phyir lha'i bu stong tshang bas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la
12a4(mdo sde): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang srog chags stong tshang ba gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de dag la lha'i
12a5(mdo sde): tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po rnams kyis mngon par gtor nas thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
12a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par bgyid pa dang / 'chang bar bgyid pa dang / klog par bgyid pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa de dag bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
12a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag khyim na mchis sam/ dgon pa na mchis sam/ shing drung na mchis sam/ khyim stong pa na mchis sam/ 'brog dgon pa na mchis sam/ lam dang lam gol ba na mchis
12a8(mdo sde): sam/ gnyid log gam/ gnyid ma log pa dag na yang de dag la pha rol gyi gnod pas 'gum par mi 'gyur bar bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
12b1(mdo sde): stsal pa/ kun dga' bo da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du chos
12b2(mdo sde): gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gnas mal dang / snyun gyi rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed na/ kun dga' bo de tsam gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur sti byas par mi 'gyur/ bla mar byas par mi 'gyur/
12b3(mdo sde): ri mor byas par mi 'gyur/ mchod pa byas par mi 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin par byed dam/
12b4(mdo sde): 'chang bar byed dam/ klog par byed dam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang na/ kun dga' bo de tsam gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur
12b5(mdo sde): sti dam pa dang / bla mar bya ba dam pa dang / ri mor bya ba dam pa dang / mchod pa dam pas bkur sti byas pa yin/ bla mar byas pa yin/ ri mor byas pa yin/ mchod pa byas pa yin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/
12b6(mdo sde): bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi
12b7(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam
12b8(mdo sde): grangs 'di phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par sel ba zhes bya bar zung shig / 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba dang / dngos po med par rtogs pa zhes bya ba dang / mtshan nyid med par rtogs pa
13a1(mdo sde): zhes bya bar yang zung shig / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal dang srog chags stong tshang
13a2(mdo sde): ba de dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod
13a3(mdo sde): do/ /'phags pa phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud d+ha sing ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban de rtsangs de ben dra rak+Shi tas bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de klu'i rgyal mtshan
13a4(mdo sde): gyis zhu chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa/ / @#/ / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sab ta bud d+ha ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
13a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ti se'i ri'i rtse mo lha'i gnas na drang srong gi spyod pa dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong
13a6(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun chen po dang byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / kun du bzang po dang / mtha'
13a7(mdo sde): yas me tog dang / kun nas me tog dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri'i rtse mo'i nags khrod de nyid na
13a8(mdo sde): dge slong zhig 'byung pos zin nas brdol cing gcer bu gos med la lag pa bsgreng ste ngu zhing 'dug pa gzigs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/
13b1(mdo sde): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyil na kyi hud ces sgra 'byin pa
13b2(mdo sde): 'di dang / dge slong gcer bu gos ma mchis pa lag pa stong pa gcig shos 'di yang su zhig lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka'
13b3(mdo sde): stsal to/ /nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni nad kyis btab pa yin no/ /gcig shos 'di yang nad kyis btab pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad
13b4(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ /nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i rig sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas
13b5(mdo sde): sprul pa mdzad de/ de nas nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa drug byung ngo / /bdun pa ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/
13b6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/
13b7(mdo sde): u0f00 hu lu hu lu/ hi li hi li ya/ na mo dza ka /na mash+tsa nA ya/ na mo na maHswA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam
13b8(mdo sde): mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed na/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ chu dang / sdug bsngal ba'i nad kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi
14a1(mdo sde): ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de dug zos kyang zas bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /zas dang skom la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te zos na pha rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo / /nad thams cad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro/ /
14a2(mdo sde): ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas la sna ma'i mar sbyin no/ /mdze dang skrangs nad kyis btab pa
14a3(mdo sde): rnams la sna ma'i mar dang / ud pa la sngon po dang / shu ti dang / nye'u shing rnams bsres pa'i mar byin na nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug
14a4(mdo sde): tor can steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /
14a5(mdo sde): na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ u0f00 pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa pa ya sarba b+hU tA nAM/ tshin d+ha ya kI la pa ra bid+yA nAM swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya
14a6(mdo sde): ba dang / bsgom nyes pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gsungs shing / ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa'i snying
14a7(mdo sde): po 'di zung shig / nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig nga'i snying po 'di nyin lan gsum yid la byed na/ de la pha rol gyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar
14a8(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'di'i cho ga gzhan ni nad thams cad la skud pas bcing bar bya'o/ /
14b1(mdo sde): 'dus pa las gyur pa la ni sna ma'i mar la bzlas brjod byas te sbyin no/ /chus phyogs bcing par bya'o/ /skud pas bdag la bsrung ngo / /byis pa rnams kyi gdon dag la skud pa sngon po gdags so/ /mtshon btab pa'i rna bar lan bdun bzlas brjod
14b2(mdo sde): bya'o/ /gzhan dag la yang rang gi blos sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po
14b3(mdo sde): thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ u0f00 ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ku la ud sA d+ha nAM ku ru/ sarba gra hA nA~M swA hA/ nam mkha'i
14b4(mdo sde): snying po gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyis gsungs shing / ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa ste/ nam mkha'i snying po khyod
14b5(mdo sde): kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung shig / gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed na/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ dug gis mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ rims nad kyis
14b6(mdo sde): mi 'debs shing chu dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa ni ma gtogs so/ /dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig nang par
14b7(mdo sde): langs nas mgo bkrus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de la sems can sdang ba gang dag dang / rgyal po rnams thog mar smra bar 'gyur ro/ /
14b8(mdo sde): sems can thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa thams cad kyi nang du yid la bya'o/ /'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad la skud pa dkar po gdags so/ /mig nad la shing 'o ma can
15a1(mdo sde): las skud pa byas te rna ba la gdags so/ /dmag rengs par byed par 'dod pas zho dang sbrang rtsi la spags pa'i 'bras yos la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin bsreg bya'o/ /rA dza nan rA dza mA traM ma pA ba shI ka ra du kA ma ne/ 'o ma
15a2(mdo sde): can gyi shing gi sbar shing gis me bus la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sbyin bsreg bya'o/ /bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa byang zhing / dpal chen po dang / nor gyi phung po chen po bsgrub
15a3(mdo sde): par 'dod na/ 'o ma can gyi shing gi sbar shing gis me bus la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sbyin bsreg bya'o/ /sdig pa ji snyed pa thams cad sbyang bar 'dod pa dang / rig sngags thams cad grub par 'dod pa dang / bdag bkru bar
15a4(mdo sde): 'dod pas/ shu ti dang / na la da dang / khre dang / shi ri sha dang / rgya spos dang / gur gum dang / gla sgang dang / in dra ba ru na dang / byang chub kyi shing dang / a mra'i mgo lcogs dang 'di rnams kyis bkru bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar nyin
15a5(mdo sde): zhag gcig smyung bar bya zhing bum pa sar pa bzhag ste/ zla ba nya ba la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags la khrus bya'o/ /dug mi gdug par byed par 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar seng
15a6(mdo sde): ldeng gi thur ma ba'i lci bar smyugs pa brgya rtsa brgyad ming nas smos te sbyin bsreg byas na dug mi gdug par 'gyur ro/ /gdon bsrung ba dang / 'byung po la sogs pa'i las thams cad la yang sbyar bar byas na bde bar gnas
15a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog
15a8(mdo sde): pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ na maHkra kuts+tshan dA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar ha te sa~M myag saM bud d+hA ya/ u0f00 ka Ta ka Ta/ ka Tha ka Tha/ ki Ti ki Ti/ ki Thi ki Thi/
15b1(mdo sde): ki tA pa ya nA maHswA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dad sel ces bya ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rangs pa'i snying po
15b2(mdo sde): 'di khyod kyis zung shig / blangs shing bzung ste kun chub par byas na phyi ma'i tshe dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag de'i tshe dkon mchog gsum la dad pa rnyed nas khrus byas te/ bcom ldan
15b3(mdo sde): 'das la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dag gis mchod pa byas nas gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par gyur na/ tshe rabs bdun du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i che ba nyid thob par
15b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /yang mi rnams kyi nang du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /yang na cho ga bzhin du sgrub na de mir skye ba tha ma thob par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur
15b5(mdo sde): ro/ /tshe 'di la yang rtag tu brjod na nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /zas dang skom gyi rnam pa la lan bdun bsngags te/ zos 'thungs na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /
15b6(mdo sde): ji ste skom zhi bar 'dod na bza' ba thams cad la lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis bkru bar bya'o/ /lhog rgal gcod na zangs khab kyis bya'o/ /'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'ching ba thams cad las thar bar bya na lan bdun
15b7(mdo sde): bzlas brjod bya ste/ rtag tu nor yang 'phel bar 'gyur/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad las kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod na des phyogs gtsang mar mchod rten gyi
15b8(mdo sde): 'khor sar dkyil 'khor bskus la/ a ga rus bdugs te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/ de'i drung du sngas shar phyogs su bstan te nyal na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /yid la ci smon pa de
16a1(mdo sde): thams cad ston to/ /tshe 'am stobs sam pham rgyal thams cad kyang ston to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad
16a2(mdo sde): thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ na maHka na ka mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te
16a3(mdo sde): sa~M myag sam bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ u0f00 sa ra sa ra sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri si ri si ri si ri ya/ d+ha ma d+ha ma d+ha ma ya/ d+hu ma d+hu ma d+hu ma d+hu ma d+hu mA ya/ na mo nA ma ya ka na ka mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te sa~M myag sa~M bud d+hA ya swA hA/
16a4(mdo sde): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig snying po 'di 'dzin cing rtag tu bzlas rjod byed pa de la mtshon
16a5(mdo sde): gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung / me dang / chu dang / lce 'bab pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ dug thams cad kyang zas dang 'dra bar thub par 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ gshis ngan du 'chi
16a6(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ /dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na/ sngon
16a7(mdo sde): gyi las kyi sgrib par gyur pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste pha rol nad las thar bar byed par 'dod na ci nus su gtor ma gtong zhing pog gam/ a ga ru'i bdug pas bdugs la gza' thams cad la khrus bya'o/ /mdze
16a8(mdo sde): dang skrangs nad dang mchin skran la shu dag 'jam po btags pa sbrang rtsi dang bsres te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags te bskus na mdze nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bzhi pa la
16b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sna ma'i me tog gi phreng ba la lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te/ mi'i mgo la bcings na zhag bzhi pa'i rims sos par 'gyur ro/ /mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas na rjed byed
16b2(mdo sde): las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /lus srul pos zin pa rnams la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog gis bdug go/ /de la sogs pa'i las rnams byed de/ las thams cad byed pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
16b3(mdo sde): 'od srung steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /
16b4(mdo sde): na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ u0f00 ha ra ha ra ha ra/ ha ha ha/ na maHkA sh+ya pA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te sa~M myag sam bud d+hA ya/ sid+h+yan du man tra pa daiHswA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gis byang
16b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i snying po snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs
16b6(mdo sde): pa ste/ nam mkha'i snying po snying po 'di khyod kyis zung shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ nyin mo 'am/ mtshan mo lan gsum gsum bzlas rjod byed na
16b7(mdo sde): mdor na rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang byang bar 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las ni ma gtogs so/ /las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /mdze dang sha bkra la sogs pa la
16b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog la sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags te blags shing bkrus na sos par 'gyur ro/ /glad pa na ba la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bzhag ste/
17a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/ /thams cad du yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad
17a2(mdo sde): la phan pa'i don gyi phyir rig sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ tad+ya thA g+hu me g+hu me ma hA g+hu me/ ta la ta le ma hA ta le/ tsa le tsa le ma hA tsa le/ d+hu re d+hu re ma hA d+hu re/ ti ri ti ri ma hA ti ri/
17a3(mdo sde): ki li ki li ma hA ki li/ tsu ru tsu ru ma hA tsu ru/ mi li mi li ma hA mi li/ ti li ti li ma hA ti li/ d+hu me d+hu me ma hA d+hu me/ tsa le tsa le ma hA tsa le/ khi ri khi ri ma hA khi ri/ tsi li tsi li ma hA tsi li swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
17a4(mdo sde): pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /glad pa'i nad bsal na mtshon dang lag mthil gyis bya'o/ /sprin bzlog na shing ka ra bi ra'i lcug mas bya'o/ /dug
17a5(mdo sde): spo na chus bya'o/ /las gzhan rnams kyang bya'o/ /khrus kyi cho gas sbyar bar bya'o/ /cho ga thams cad kyis thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
17a6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/
17a7(mdo sde): Ar+ya aSh+Ta bud d+ha ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa
17a8(mdo sde): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang
17b1(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin du rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don
17b2(mdo sde): rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/
17b3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ /de nas de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ ma dkrol bar bar snang
17b4(mdo sde): las sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sgra dag kyang byung / lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man 'dzu sha ka chen po'i me tog gi char yang bab ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med
17b5(mdo sde): zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba thams cad rin po che'i me tog gis chal pas gang bar gyur to/ /de nas de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gser gyi kha dog snang ba chen
17b6(mdo sde): pos khyab par gyur to/ /de nas de'i mod la shar phyogs nas pad ma sdong po ni gser/ 'dab ma ni dngul/ ze 'bru ni bai dUr+ya/ snying po ni rdo'i snying po las grub pa brgyad cig byung bar gyur to/ /pad ma'i snying po thams cad
17b7(mdo sde): kyi steng na seng ge'i khri gru bzhi pa/ rtsa ba bzhi zug pa/ bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ dri dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ dar gyi lda ldi spyangs pa/ pog phor nas spos kyi dris shin du bdugs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs du ma
17b8(mdo sde): dag gis legs par brgyan pa/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma 'khrol ba/ rin po che du ma'i bla re bres pa dag byung bar gyur to/ /seng ge'i khri thams cad kyi steng na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dag kyang bzhugs par yang
18a1(mdo sde): snang ste/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ dul ba dang zhi gnas mchog brnyes pa/ dul ba dang zhi gnas dam pa brnyes pa/ dbang po bsrungs shing thul ba/ glang po shin du dul ba lta bu/ mtsho ltar dang zhing rnyog pa med la gsal
18a2(mdo sde): ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis sku legs par brgyan pa/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i skus nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzi brjid zil gyis mnan te bzhugs pa/ spyod lam brgya stong du ma dang ldan
18a3(mdo sde): pa/ sku mdog blta bas chog mi shes pa dag snang ngo / /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom
18a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs nas pad ma sdong po ni gser/ 'dab ma ni dngul/ ze'u 'bru ni bai dUr+ya/
18a5(mdo sde): snying po ni rdo'i snying po las grub pa brgyad po 'di dag byung bar gyur te/ pad ma'i snying po thams cad kyi steng na seng ge'i khri gru bzhi pa/ rtsa ba bzhi zug pa/ bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ dri dang ldan pa/ yid du mchi ba/ dar
18a6(mdo sde): gyi lda ldi spyangs pa/ pog por nas spos kyi dris shin du bdugs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs du mas legs par brgyan pa/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma 'khrol ba/ rin po che du ma'i bla re bres pa dag byung bar gyur
18a7(mdo sde): pa/ seng ge'i khri thams cad kyi steng na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dag bzhugs par yang gda' ste/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ dul ba dang zhi gnas mchog brnyes pa/
18a8(mdo sde): dul ba dang zhi gnas dam pa brnyes pa/ dbang po bsrungs shing thul ba/ glang po che shin du dul ba lta bu mtsho ltar dang zhing rnyog pa med la gsal ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis po dag gis sku legs par brgyan pa/ gser gyi kha
18b1(mdo sde): dog lta bu'i skus nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzi brjid zil gyis mnan ste bzhugs pa/ spyod lam brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa/ sku mdog blta bas chog mi shes pa dag gda' ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de
18b2(mdo sde): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
18b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs
18b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin du yongs
18b5(mdo sde): bsgrags dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na
18b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams yid 'ong dga' zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho
18b7(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sdug dga' zhes bya ba yod de/
18b8(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin du rnam par gnon pa grags mchog dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /shA ri'i bu
19a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sgo kun nas 'jug pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
19a2(mdo sde): pa yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas g.yul las shin du rnam par rgyal ba'i rtsal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su
19a3(mdo sde): s angs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam dag brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan bkod
19a4(mdo sde): pa'i dpal kun du snang ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed 'das
19a5(mdo sde): pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'gyur med ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi rgyal po dpal thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te
19a6(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams spobs pa brtsegs pa gang
19a7(mdo sde): z hes bya ba yod de de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad ma las rnam par gnon pas bzhud pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
19a8(mdo sde): ston to/ /shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sgra dbyangs snyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
19b1(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad ma la rab tu gnas pa sA la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
19b2(mdo sde): gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag ni yongs su dag pa ste/ snyigs ma lnga med do/ /ya mtshan can thams cad med do/ /gseg ma dang gyo mo dag med do/ /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med do/ /bud med med do/ /dud 'gro dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten
19b3(mdo sde): yang med do/ /sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / sdig sbrul gyis reg pa rnams med do/ /shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog
19b4(mdo sde): pa dang / ston pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / kun chub par byed pa de dag ngan song gsum du 'gro ba de ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ shA ri'i bu de dag sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig
19b5(mdo sde): rten du 'gro ba de ni gnas med de/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba'i gang zag ni ma gtogs te/ de yang chung ngu myong zhing mang du myong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang sangs rgyas
19b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / kun chub par byed pa de byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du nam yang mngon par shes pa dang bral bar
19b7(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/ nam yang mtshan dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang gzungs dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang sgra dbyangs shin du rgyas pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang rnga sgra'i dbyangs
19b8(mdo sde): dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang sbyin gnas dang phyir mi ldog pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang theg pa chen po'i mdo sde shin du rgyas pa dang bral bar mi
20a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ shA ri'i bu bud med gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang /
20a2(mdo sde): kun chub par byed pa de bud med kyi dngos po lan gnyis thob par 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do/ /smon lam gyi dbang gis len pa ni ma gtogs so/ /shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/
20a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / kun chub par byed na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de rgyal pos
20a4(mdo sde): 'jigs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rkun pos sam/ mes sam/ chus sam/ ma rungs pas sam/ klus sam/ gnod sbyin gyis sam/ dri zas sam/ lha ma yin gyis sam/ mis sam/ mi ma yin pas 'jigs par 'gyur ba 'am/
20a5(mdo sde): gang gis kyang glags rnyed par 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa drag po ni ma gtogs te/ de yang chung ngu myong zhing mang du myong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don gang
20a6(mdo sde): ci rtsom yang rung ste/ de dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel ba nyid tu 'gyur gyi/ 'grib par mi 'gyur bar re bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'jig rten mgon po
20a7(mdo sde): de dag gi/ /mtshan rnams 'dzin par byed pa ni/ /mi khom thams cad yongs spangs nas/ /myur du bzang 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes byas nas/ /ston pa de mthong dad byed cing / /'jig rten sgron ma
20a8(mdo sde): mthong nas kyang / /mchod pa bzang po byed par 'gyur/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /'khor ba rnam par spong bar byed/ /gang gis 'dren rnams mthong 'gyur ba'i/ /dri med mig kyang rnam par sbyong / /'jig rten mgon
20b1(mdo sde): po de dag gi/ /mtshan rnams su zhig 'dzin byed pa/ /de ni gang dang gar skyes par/ /'jig rten phyag bya'i 'os su 'gyur/ /de yi gzugs mtshan phun sum tshogs/ /phyug po'i khyim du skye bar 'gyur/ /dpa' zhing sbyin
20b2(mdo sde): pa'i bdag por 'gyur/ /ser sna med cing lhug par gtong / /mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por ni/ /lha yi tsan dan dmar po yi/ /dri ngad kha nas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /drang srong chen po de dag gi/ /mtshan
20b3(mdo sde): rnams bud med thos gyur na/ /bud med dngos po rnam spangs te/ /skyes bu mkhas par red par 'gyur/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/ /pha dang ma dang spun rnams dang / /mdza' bshes nye du'i tshogs rnams kyi/ /sdug
20b4(mdo sde): bsngal nam yang mthong mi 'gyur/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/ /de dang de dag 'jig rten na/ /'dab ma stong phrag bye ldan pa'i/ /rin chen pad mar skye bar 'gyur/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/ /sangs rgyas
20b5(mdo sde): zhing rnams thams cad du/ /nam mkha' las ni 'gro byed cing / /'jig rten mgon po sangs rgyas zhing / /rnam par dag pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po'i drung dag tu/ /zab mo'i chos ni nyan byed cing / /ji ltar thos
20b6(mdo sde): pa chud mi gson/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/ /de dag la ni sdig can bdud/ /nag po'i rtsa lag sder bcas pas/ /nam yang glags rnyed mi 'gyur ro/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/ /de dag mtshon gyis
20b7(mdo sde): mi gsod cing / /dug dang mes kyang ma yin la/ /rgyal po dang ni rkun po yis/ /de dag gtse bar byed mi 'gyur/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /dri za lto 'phye che rnams kyis/ /klags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas
20b8(mdo sde): 'di dag mi mchog ste/ /dpal gyi snying po 'brug gi rgyal/ /'dzangs pa bag yod gyur nas ni/ /mkhas mi su zhig mtshan mi 'dzin/ /'jig rten mgon po thams cad kyi/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag su nyan pa/ /mi de dag
21a1(mdo sde): ni cho gas nyan/ /grags ldan rnams kyi mtshan thos nas/ /de dag dpa' zhing shes rab che/ /'jig rten mi mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
21a2(mdo sde): ri'i bu dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa sangs rgyas brgyad
21a3(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba theg po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ da sha bud d+ha nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
21a4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong phrag
21a5(mdo sde): rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe 'khor de nyid tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul yangs pa'i li tsa bi gzhon nu yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ /
21a6(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de
21a7(mdo sde): logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te bdag cag gis zhu ba zhus pas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rangs pa lta na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
21a8(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas
21b1(mdo sde): pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gang dang gang 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i
21b2(mdo sde): lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu
21b3(mdo sde): ' am rigs kyi bu mo la las 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na da ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston pa gang dag gi mtshan bzung na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
21b4(mdo sde): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba mchis sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
21b5(mdo sde): yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa legs so legs so/ /yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa khyod 'di ltar 'dir lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang / skye bo mang po
21b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa
21b7(mdo sde): yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa khyod yang legs so/ /yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa de'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo
21b8(mdo sde): zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /yon tan rin
22a1(mdo sde): chen me tog rgyas pa shar phyogs logs na yon tan thams cad rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan
22a2(mdo sde): bskal pa dpag tu med pa las 'das pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston to/ /bskal pa de ni thams cad nye bar bsags shing brtsegs pa zhes bya'o/ /de na sems can rnams kyi tshe
22a3(mdo sde): yang dpag tu med do/ /bcom ldan 'das yon tan bskal pa dpag tu med pa las 'das pa de'i 'khor thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos
22a4(mdo sde): d e bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan bskal pa dpag tu med pa las 'das pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan bzung na bskal pa stong phrag drug bcur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis
22a5(mdo sde): phyogs par byed do/ /shi 'phos nas kyang sgrib pa med pa'i gzungs shes bya ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang spobs pa yang dag par bskyed do/ /
22a6(mdo sde): chos ston pa na yang khengs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang gis skyob pa'i mtshan ni bzung byas na/ /de la byang chub dam pa rnyed sla zhing / /bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan gzhan rnams dang / /yon
22a7(mdo sde): tan dri med 'di dag mis 'thob 'gyur/ /yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa lho phyogs logs na yon tan rin chen bkod pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
22a8(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen bkod pa'i dpal gzi brjid kyi phung po'i bskal pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston to/ /bskal pa de ni yon tan rgya che ba zhes bya'o/ /rigs
22b1(mdo sde): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen yon tan bkod pa'i dpal gzi brjid kyi phung po'i bskal pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan bzung na shi 'phos nas nyi
22b2(mdo sde): ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyis mthas klas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa dpag tu med pa rnams yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du smon lam
22b3(mdo sde): btab pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs so/ /shi 'phos nas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di
22b4(mdo sde): skad ces bya ste/ khyab bdag mtshan 'di sus bzung ba/ /mtha' klas pa yi ting nge 'dzin/ /'od ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor can/ /mtshan rnams bcas te shi bas 'thob/ /yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa nub phyogs na sbyor
22b5(mdo sde): bas mun pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa'i dpal da ltar
22b6(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston to/ /bskal pa de ni shAkya'i rgyal po bkod pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
22b7(mdo sde): rgyas chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba de'i mtshan bzung na mtshon cha dang / me dang / chu dang / dug gis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur zhing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /shi 'phos nas shugs brgya
22b8(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rgyal ba de yi mtshan ni sus bzung ba/ /me dang chu dang dug gis mi 'chi zhing / /'di la mtshon gyis mi tshugs mkhas pa dang / /mngal du mi skye gzungs
23a1(mdo sde): rnams mi des 'thob/ /yon tan rin chen me tog rgyas pa byang phyogs logs na mun pa dang rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
